name: Coniucta
description:
In Coniucta you start with the four basic elements: fire, water, air and earth.

Starting from those four elements, you will have to combine them to discover the more than 900 elements and 1300 combinations that this game has.

Will you be able to discover everything?

Positive reviews (specially in Google Play Store) and sharing the game with your friends would help us a lot :D
